title: Ojama Yuurei-kun
original_name: おじゃまユーレイくん
sinopse:
Yuurei dies in an accident, but his soul is not taken to the afterlife. So he roams the earth haunting his childhood friend Kodama who is the only person who can see him, occasionally possessing her body and the bodies of other people for all kinds of mischief.

(Source: MU)
